question: 活気
sourceMnemonic: If you have <kanji>lively</kanji> <kanji>energy</kanji> you have more than enough <vocabulary>energy</vocabulary> for everyone to start noticing. They come up to you and compliment you on your amazing <vocabulary>liveliness</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just be careful because <ja>かつ</ja> is being shortened here to <ja>かっ</ja>. It's a pretty common change for on'yomi ending in <ja>つ</ja>, so keep your eyes open for more that do this!
